snifc
Interface LinkIfc

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable
public interface LinkIfc
extends Identifiable

Link interface represents a link in the network of sensors. A link is passive, it is used by a sensor when it needs to transmit a new Packet on the network and passes a pending packet to the client sensor. A link connects to sensors, through a full-duplex connexion. A link has a one step tranmition delay Sensor --> (transmit) --> Link Sensor <-- (getPendingPacket) -- Link

Author:
sfrenot
